name: The Big Reveal
description:
A visual novella where you are the White House Press Secretary, preparing a Presidential speech where the existence of aliens will be revealed. Meet with the President, the Pentagon, and the Aliens themselves to learn about the situation and find ways to influence your audience, then craft The Big Reveal. Keep the Aliens peaceful and America calm to keep your job!

IndieCade Greenlight Game Jam Entry

This project will be my first Game Jam entry, as part of IndieCade's Greenlight Game Jam from 5/16/22-6/19/22. Follow this space and my social media for updates over the next month as I work up to a Big Reveal of my own!

5/21/2022 - Sprint 1: Ideation

I've uploaded a hefty PDF of ideas and plans for the game, which I've compiled into a Design Document that outlines the flow and mechanics of the game at a high level, including some mocked up screenshots (also live on this Project page) and tables for how I'm planning on handling stat checks.
